name: hd-neural-net
description: A powerful node module, which lets you create, train and run calculations on a neural net. It uses a simple public interface and is lightweight and fast.

scripts.minify: for i in $(find ./build -name *.js); do uglifyjs $i -o $i -mc --comments '/^!/'; done
scripts.prepare: npm run ts && npm run minify
